# Copilot Instructions

This file provides repository-wide instructions and context for GitHub Copilot when working in this repository.

---

## Project Overview

This is the **SalChicanoLoco-SenaAIgent** repository.  
It provides backend ML analytics, image generation, aesthetic analysis, and multi-agent orchestration.  
Licensed under the MIT License.

---

## General Guidelines

- Follow clean code principles and write maintainable, readable code.
- Use meaningful variable and function names.
- Ensure consistency with the existing codebase style.
- Include appropriate error handling and avoid silent failures.
- Only add comments when necessary to explain complex logic.

---

## Code Style

- Use consistent indentation and formatting.
- Keep functions small and focused on a single responsibility.
- Follow Pythonic convent
